mapper.sql: id, batch_no, story_name, case_name, case_owner, case_step_num, case_result, newly_fail, keep_failing, start_time, end_time, duration
select batch_no from tb_testcase order by id desc limit 0,1
mapper.select:
select tb_dashboard.batch_no, tb_dashboard.feature_name, tb_dashboard.build_env, tb_testcase.id, tb_testcase.story_name, tb_testcase.case_name, tb_testcase.case_owner, tb_testcase.case_step_num, tb_testcase.case_result, tb_testcase.newly_fail, tb_testcase.keep_failing, tb_testcase.start_time, tb_testcase.duration from tb_testcase,tb_dashboard
and tb_dashboard.batch_no = tb_testcase.batch_no
and tb_dashboard.batch_no like concat('%',#{batchNo},'%')
and feature_name like concat('%',#{featureName},'%')
and story_name like concat('%',#{storyName},'%')
and case_name like concat('%',#{caseName},'%')
and case_owner like concat('%',#{caseOwner},'%')
and case_result = #{caseResult}
order by
id desc
id asc
id desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_testcase (id, batch_no, story_name, case_name, case_owner, case_step_num, case_result, newly_fail, keep_failing, start_time, end_time, duration) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseStepNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{caseResult,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{newlyFail,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{keepFailing,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{duration,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into tb_testcase (batch_no, story_name, case_name, case_owner, case_step_num, case_result, newly_fail, keep_failing, start_time, end_time, duration) values
( #{caseInfo.batchNo}, #{caseInfo.storyName}, #{caseInfo.caseName}, #{caseInfo.caseOwner}, #{caseInfo.caseStepNum}, #{caseInfo.caseResult}, #{caseInfo.newlyFail}, #{caseInfo.keepFailing}, #{caseInfo.startTime}, #{caseInfo.endTime}, #{caseInfo.duration} )

mapper.update:
update tb_testcase
batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
story_name = #{storyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_name = #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_owner = #{caseOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_step_num = #{caseStepNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
case_result = #{caseResult,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},

keep_failing = #{keepFailing,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
duration = #{duration,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_testcase set batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, story_name = #{storyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_name = #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_owner = #{caseOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_step_num = #{caseStepNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, case_result = #{caseResult,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, newly_fail = #{newlyFail,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, keep_failing = #{keepFailing,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
